House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01315
FULL TITLE : AN ACT GRANTING SPECIFIC EMERGENCY POWERS TO THE PRESIDENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES TO EFFECTIVELY ADDRESS THE METRO MANILA GRIDLOCK
SHORT TITLE : Metro Manila Traffic Crisis Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Declares it a State policy to adopt timely, adequate and effective measures to address the Metro Manila gridlock that has taken its toll on national economy and normal social life.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-07-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
